heading: Other permits notwithstanding
text:
Where a sign maintenance permit has been established by the commissioner
   pursuant to section 28-501.1 such permit shall be required for all signs maintained in the areas described in such section 28-
   501.1 and not otherwise excluded under section 28-501.6, whether or not a work permit is required and/or has been issued for
   the installation, alteration or erection of such sign pursuant to chapter 1 of this title.
